question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project
evidence_answer: Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs
evidence: (cid:131) The City has hired a consultant to design this project.

The design has

started and is anticipated to be completed by the Spring of 2022.

(cid:131) Begin Construction: Fall 2022
